summary: This is a little fix that makes it possible to sell or give back all of the Elder Scrolls (Blood, Sun & Dragon) to Dexion when choosing either the Vampire or Dawnguard quest-line.
descriptionHtml:
This is a little fix that makes it possible to sell or give back all of the Elder Scrolls (Blood, Sun & Dragon) to Dexion when choosing either the Vampire or Dawnguard quest-line.

For the OCD people like me that can\'t stand having extra junk in their inventory. ;)

Enjoy!


[color=Yellow][b]- All scrolls can now be sold to Dexion.

- New script checks to make sure the MQ has reached a certain stage before allowing you to sell the Dragon Elder Scroll. *You must obtain the [u]Dragonrend shout[/u] 1st.

- Scrolls are now sold for 6000 each.
[/b][/color]



[b]Compatibility:[/b]

[b][color=RED]-  Place the mod late in your load order for complete compatibility[/b][/color].

[b]Change Log:[/b]

1.6 - Cleaned up .esp file, added new dialogue conditions, and corrected minor scripting issues.
1.5.1 - All scrolls can now be sold to Dexion.
1.5 - Corrected issue where Blood and Sun scrolls couldn\'t be sold back after the MQ had ended.
1.4 - Re-wrote script.
1.3 - Added scripted version that will not allow you to sell the Dragon scroll before the MQ ends.
1.2 - Fixed issues with dialogue options for selling scrolls.
1.1 - Added ability to sell back the Dragon Scroll to Urag.
1.0 - Initial release.


[b]My Mods:[/b]

Visit [url=http://www.firingsquad.us]WWW.FIRINGSQUAD.US[/url] for the latest news and updates on my mods.

Don\'t forget to endorse! ;)


[b]Installation: [/b]

1. Use NMM installer.

or 

2. Install manually by adding SellThoseElderScrolls.esp to Skyrim/Data folder.
3. Install .PEX files from the Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder.


[b]Uninstall:[/b]

1. Deactivate with NMM.

or

2. Remove SellThoseElderScrolls.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.
3. Remove SellDragonScroll.pex from the Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder.


[b]Contact:[/b]

You can contact me here or my personal website forums [url=http://www.firingsquad.us]WWW.FIRINGSQUAD.US[/url]
author: Hobbs
